description:
Tool for capturing and analyzing logs produced by AudioCodes Session Border Controller (SBC), Media Gateway and IP Phone devices.

Syslog Viewer utility can be used for two major tasks:
- Recording and displaying syslog messages from AudioCodes devices (SBC / Gateway / IP Phones)
- Analyzing recorded logs (including support for interactive SIP Flow Diagram)
- Support parsing of PCAP files for both old (pre-4.2.0) and new (4.2.0 and later) Wireshark versions.
- Improve detection of SDP in SIP Flow Diagram.
- New option in "Highlight Keywords" dialog enables configuration of highlight mode - Line or Keyword.
- Upgrade OpenSSL library to version 3.4.1 for main (Qt6) build.
